Blueprint\\BlueprintGenerator.doc: PHP Blueprint — BlueprintGenerator Generates a JSON blueprint of a PHP library's class signatures via static analysis (no code execution), suitable for LLM context.
methods: __construct(string $namespaceFilter = '', bool $publicOnly = true, bool $skipInternal = true, bool $shortDocs = false, int $compactEnumsThreshold = 0, list<string> $excludeNamespaces = [])
extractFromDirectory(string $directory): array<string, array<string, mixed>> — Extract class signatures from a directory of PHP files.
